statements: UPDATE Energy_Storage SET storage_capacity = 150 WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE energy_storage_facility SET location = 'New York' WHERE facility_name = 'Battery Depot';

UPDATE energy_storage_products SET manufacturer = 'XYZ Corp' WHERE product_id = 1;
